| History                 = {{Quote|Who knows how to not get your stuff stolen better than the guy who used to steal you stuff?|[[Ant-Man Security Solutions (Earth-616)|Ant-Man Security Solutions]]' slogan|Ant-Man Vol 1 2}}
[[Scott Lang (Earth-616)|Scott Lang]] formed the Ant-Man Security Solutions as his opportunity to have his own company.{{r|Ant-Man Vol 1 2}}

[[Maxwell Markham (Earth-616)|Grizzly]] came to Miami to have revenge on Ant-Man due to his betrayal during [[Siege]], unaware he had targeted Scott instead of [[Eric O'Grady (Earth-616)|Eric O'Grady]], who was dead. After the misunderstanding was cleared, Lang offered Grizzly a place at his new company.{{r|Ant-Man Vol 1 2}} 

[[Samuel Saxon (Earth-616)|Machinesmith]] moved to [[Miami]], where he joined [[Villains Anonymous (Earth-616)|Villains Anonymous]]  in an attempt to escape from his criminal career. He was hired by Scott to help hack into the systems of [[Cross Technological Enterprises (Earth-616)|Cross Technological Enterprises]].{{r|Ant-Man Vol 1 4}}

Following Scott's arrest and several screw-ups, the business was shut down.{{r|Astonishing Ant-Man Vol 1 13}}
